DOC.brief_title: Coronary Artery Disease Renal Failure Registry
DOC.criteria: Women men > = 18 year age Patients actually perform interventional coronary angiography document coronary heart disease , define least one document stenosis > = 50 % least one main coronary vessel ( Main steam ; RCX ; RIVA ; RCA ) European/Caucasian descent ( European/Caucasian parent grandparent ) Availability urine , serum EDTA blood sample patient Documented consent patient handle personal medical data , include genetic analysis Patients already recruit registry Patients organ transplantation , apart kidney transplantation Immunosuppressive therapy , apart immunosuppressive therapy kidney transplantation Patients polycystic renal disease Pregnant breastfeeding patient Known malignant tumor
